Articles.Content:
A realistic render of the Rockomax "Mainsail" Liquid Engine. I'm also currently working on the Skipper engine. Requests are welcome!

Modeled in Autodesk Maya 2014 and rendered with Mental Ray.

Tell me what you guys think!

That is a fantastic looking render

Welcome to the forums!

Nice, can't wait to see the Skipper!

(Also, my 600th post.)

Edited August 13, 2014 by Rainbowtrout

That is a fantastic looking render

Welcome to the forums!

Thanks a lot Kasper!

Nice, can't wait to see the Skipper!

I'm on it!
That's really good! If you've got particle effects down, I'd love to see that engine at full thrust
Oooooooooooh. Do the Claw next.
Nice render! Any plans to make a nuclear engine? (Glowing perhaps?)

Ooo, shiny. And true to form.

I wouldn't mind seeing the poodle engine, I think you're going to get a lot of requests.

This is what I see the models of KSP V1.0.0 looking like.

Nice work!!
Hot dang! That is INCREDIBLE! TAKE SOME REP!
Quick question: how did you get the model for the engine?

That's really good! If you've got particle effects down, I'd love to see that engine at full thrust

I thought about it, I'll give it a shot and if it looks any good, I'll put it up!

Oooooooooooh. Do the Claw next.

Once I get enough requests for it, I will!

Nice render! Any plans to make a nuclear engine? (Glowing perhaps?)

Thanks! Sure, why not? I'll put up a poll in a while so you guys can vote what you want to see next!

Ooo, shiny. And true to form.

I wouldn't mind seeing the poodle engine, I think you're going to get a lot of requests.

Thanks! Poodle! I might do that next, after the Skipper.

This is what I see the models of KSP V1.0.0 looking like.

Nice work!!

That would be awesome! Thanks!

Hot dang! That is INCREDIBLE! TAKE SOME REP!
Quick question: how did you get the model for the engine?

Thank you!

I modeled it Maya.

on a related topic, you guys can check out my high quality ion engine renders from way back: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/69793-High-Poly-Ion-Engine-Renders

This actually is efficient enough to be a part in the game too. I'll even do you one better, free download of the model, with UV sections: http://www.filedropper.com/iond

Edited August 15, 2014 by trekkie_

Here's a bit of an update on the Skipper I'm working on.

UV mapped and ready for texturing!
AGH! So cool!
Can't wait to see the Skipper. On another note, are you able to do the fairings?

AGH! So cool!

I'm glad you like it!

Can't wait to see the Skipper. On another note, are you able to do the fairings?

The engine fairings? Sure! But I'm not quite sure what you're thinking about.

It took me a minute to decide whether or not the mainsail was a photo of a real-life model, its that good.

Be impressed with yourself, seriously thats good work.

Oh my god! That is AWESOME! Keep up the great work, I look forward to seeing the Skipper! Maybe you could do the Mk1 Command Pod or the Mk 1-2 command pod, if some other people want that to? Just render some stuff (I'm pretty sure it's not that easy as it seems like in my text... excuse me^^) till you got a little rocket!

It took me a minute to decide whether or not the mainsail was a photo of a real-life model, its that good.

Be impressed with yourself, seriously thats good work.

Thanks a lot mate!

You guys inspire me to create more!

Oh my god! That is AWESOME! Keep up the great work, I look forward to seeing the Skipper! Maybe you could do the Mk1 Command Pod or the Mk 1-2 command pod, if some other people want that to? Just render some stuff (I'm pretty sure it's not that easy as it seems like in my text... excuse me^^) till you got a little rocket!

Thank you!

Haha, yes it's a tedious process. I've been thinking the same! Mk16-XL Parachute, Mk 1-2 Command Pod, Rockomax Brand Decoupler, X200-32 Fuel Tank and a Mainsail! Maybe I will give it a shot but don't expect it anytime soon!
I was talking about the engine fairings. If I'm correct, you can copy and paste the model, and build the engine fairing around it.

Haha, yes it's a tedious process. I've been thinking the same! Mk16-XL Parachute, Mk 1-2 Command Pod, Rockomax Brand Decoupler, X200-32 Fuel Tank and a Mainsail! Maybe I will give it a shot but don't expect it anytime soon!

Yeah, that's a great idea!

Oh my god, this is amazing. You have an quite an eye for this stuff.

Personally, I'd like to see the nuclear engine and some particle effects, but you must be overwhelmed with all these requests...
Looking amazing! I cant hold myself but ask, howd you study modeling?

You're talented, and very much so. Great work here

You could save some time with modelling by using this, probably: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43513-Blender-mu-import-export-addon ...and saving the imported .mu to Maya format.

Although, it looks like you're models are high-poly. Maybe you should keep doing what you're doing since it looks so nice

Edited August 17, 2014 by Woopert
